data.name: Ice Station Z - Frosty Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Frosty Skin Pack

Ice Bear mask.
Stay Frosty Goggles.
Frozen Ice jacket (animated).
Ice Cube backpack.
Emerald Ice trousers (animated).
